about_me.subtitle: I turn complex business challenges into elegant digital solutions that drive real results.

what_i_do.title: What I Do
what_i_do.content: I specialize in building high-performance web applications and SaaS platforms that help businesses scale. From concept to deployment, I deliver solutions that are not just functional, but built to grow with your business.

my_approach.title: My Approach
my_approach.content: Every project starts with understanding your goals. I combine technical expertise with business insight to create solutions that solve real problems and deliver measurable value to your customers.

track_record.title: Proven Results
track_record.content: 7+ years delivering successful projects for companies across various industries. I've helped businesses launch products, optimize operations, and scale their digital presence with modern, maintainable code.

why_work_with_me.title: Partnership, Not Just Development
why_work_with_me.content: You get more than code ‚Äì you get a strategic partner who understands business needs. Clear communication, reliable delivery, and solutions built for long-term success.

methods.title: How I Work
methods.subtitle: A proven approach that ensures your project succeeds, on time and on budget.
methods.agile_description: Your project evolves with your needs. Regular check-ins and iterative development mean you're always in control and can pivot when needed.
methods.quality_description: Every line of code is tested and documented. Your investment is protected with maintainable, scalable solutions that grow with your business.
methods.infrastructure_description: Deployed on reliable cloud infrastructure with automated backups, monitoring, and security updates. Your application stays fast and secure.
methods.communication_description: No technical jargon, just clear updates on progress. You'll always know where your project stands and what comes next.

titles.git_flow: Git Flow and clean work results

methods.agile: I apply agile methods like SCRUM, Kanban, or Scrumban to adapt flexibly to changes during the project and incorporate regular feedback for continuous improvement. Through short iterations and regular check-ins, I ensure that requirements stay up-to-date and actionable.
methods.ci_cd: Using CI/CD in GitHub and GitLab, I optimize the development process with automated testing and continuous deployment, ensuring code changes are securely and swiftly transferred to production. This allows me to deliver functioning software at any time while maintaining quality. Depending on the stack, I also use tools like Laravel Forge for Laravel projects.
methods.git_flow: I work with a mix of Git Flow and GitHub Flow to ensure well-structured branches for both long-term and fast-paced development cycles. I make sure branches for features, fixes, and releases are clearly separated, avoiding common mistakes like working directly on the master branch, unclear commit messages, or skipping code reviews. Best practices like regular rebasing and the use of pull requests keep the codebase clean and traceable.
methods.testing: Testing is a fundamental part of my work, which I never or rarely skip. Unit tests with TDD, component tests with Cypress for UI elements, or E2E tests to verify the core functionality of the software from A to Z ensure that the code is robust and maintainable from the start, reducing risks for future changes.
